message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $14,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $16,000.  This still reflects the product's true value, and it gives you a good deal.  Let's find a middle ground!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $15,000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
